reviewText: Iconoclastic social commentary that will cause billy laughs as the preacher and choir strut out against the new orthodoxy of excess possessions and obsession with shopping.  Pope Francis may have gotten some cues from Rev. Billy.

Trailer to the film "Reverend Billy & The Church of Stop Shopping". A must see documentary for all people who are interested in the anti-globalization movement. I especially enjoyed the crucified Mickey and Minnie.

This video highlights the enormous courage & moral fortitude of these good people & their message of how through shopping at their corporate stores we are forever changing the economic landscape of America. We are shopping ourselves right into economic collapse. Amen! Rev. Billy! Amen! A Real Class Act, peppered with a great comedic sensibility!
